text:
libapr-util.so refers to unresolved symbol __lshrdi3. When compiled with gcc
2.96. This causes problems when loading APR-util from AOLserver. I have overcome
by setting LD_PRELOAD to /usr/lib/libcrypt.so. Perhaps the library should be
linked to libapr-util.
creator: aolserver@aol.net

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11122 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
